title: What Wall Street Expects in 2026
description: Every year, Wall Street’s top minds — strategists, economists and portfolio managers — pack their best ideas into dense market outlooks, often running a hundred or more pages apiece. And every year, Bloomberg senior markets editor Sam Potter distills those outlooks to capture the consensus and identify who’s breaking from the pack. On today’s Big Take podcast, Sam joins host David Gura to discuss Wall Street’s year ahead: from AI’s continued dominance and the prospects for gold and bonds to Wall
